overview: La del Manojo de Rosas, the Teatro de la Zarzuela's most emblematic and popular production, turns 30 years old. At its premiere in September 1990, it was very well received by the public and critics, and has continued to be so during the last three decades. Several generations of singers, artists, technicians and the public have enjoyed what is now Sorozábal's best-known zarzuela.
tagline: The best legacy from the Teatro de la Zarzuela stage to the Madrid of then and of now.
title: La del Manojo de Rosas
